articles.author: Hamish Hastie
articles.summary: Western Australia's carbon emissions continue to rise, according to the latest data from Australia's national greenhouse accounts. Australia's emissions have edged slightly higher from 397.06 million tonnes to 39.98 million tonnes, driven by WA's increase and increases in New South Wales and Queensland.
